welcome.WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: Please tap on the blue button below to begin. You will be redirected to our website to continue.

permission.PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION: You wouldn't be able to proceed if any of these permissions not allowed
permission.NEARBY_DEVICES_DESC: App needed Nearby Devices permission to search nearby devices
permission.BLUETOOTH_DESC: App needed Bluetooth to search devices
permission.LOCATION_DESC: App needed Location permission to search nearby devices
permission.GEO_LOCATION_DESC: App needed GEO Location permission to search nearby devices
permission.ALLOWE_PERMISSION_TITLE: would like to use Bluetooth for new connections
permission.ALLOWE_PERMISSION_MSG: You can allow new connections in Settings

forgot_password.SUBTITLE_FORGOT_YOUR_PASSWORD: If you forget your password, please enter your email address below to be emailed a OTP

verify_otp.SUBTITLE_VERIFY_OTP: Enter the code you received in your email.

reset_password.SUBTITLE_RESET_YOUR_PASSWORD: If you forget your password, please enter your email address below to be emailed a OTP
reset_password.LABEL_PLZ_PROVIDE_NEW_PASSWORD: Please provide new password for account
reset_password.LABEL_PASSWORD_CONDITION2: A mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters
reset_password.LABEL_PASSWORD_CONDITION3: A mixture of letters and numbers
reset_password.LABEL_PASSWORD_CONDITION4: Inclusive of at least one special charater, e.g., ! @ # ?

reset_password_success.SUBTITLE_RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Your password has been reset, Now just sign in to get started.

verify_email.SUBTITLE_VERIFY_EMAIL: Enter your email to receive the verification code in your inbox.

register.LABEL_TERM: I have read and agree to these
register.VALIDATION_MSG_EMPTY_TERM: Please agree our terms and condition
register.VALIDATION_MSG_MINIMUM_PASSWORD: Password must contain at least minimum 6 characters
register.VALIDATION_MSG_SAME_PASSWORD: Password and confirm password should same

register_success.SUBTITLE_REGISTER_SUCCESS: Your password has been reset, Now just sign in to get started.

activate_your_device.HEADING:
Activate
Your Device
activate_your_device.SUB_MSG:
Wave your hand 3 times in front
 of sensor within 10 seconds
 to activate you product.

connecting.HEADING: Connecting
connecting.SUB_MSG:
Connecting to your Sloan Faucet
 Might take a few seconds.

no_product_found.HEADING: No Product Found
no_product_found.SUB_MSG:
Please be sure Bluetooth is
 Enabled and try again.

device_dashboard.ADAPTIVE_SENSING_MSG: Adaptive sensing in progress. Water may be dispensed. Please wait.
device_dashboard.DISCONNECTING_MSG: Are you sure you want to disconnect?

device_details.DATE_OF_LAST_METERED_CHANGE_LABEL: Date of last Metered Runtime change
device_details.DATE_OF_LAST_ONDEMAND_CHANGE_LABEL: Date of last On-demand timeout change
device_details.DATE_OF_LAST_FLUSH_ENABLE_CHANGE_LABEL: Date of last flush enable change
device_details.DATE_OF_LAST_FLUSH_TIME_CHANGE_LABEL: Date of last flush time change
device_details.DATE_OF_LAST_FLUSH_INTERVAL_CHANGE_LABEL: Date of last flush interval change
device_details.DATE_OF_LAST_FLOW_RATE_CHANGE_LABEL: Date of last flow rate change
device_details.DATE_OF_LAST_BD_NOTE_CHANGE_LABEL: Date of last BD Note change

diagnostic_page.DIAGNOSE_SUB_TEXT:
Place your hand in front of the 
faucet for at least 3 seconds.
diagnostic_page.REPORT_SENT_SUCCESS_MSG:
Report will be sent to Sloan. Please contact Sloan
Technical Service at +1-888-756-2614 or
techsupport@sloan.com to follow up.
diagnostic_page.HINT_DESCRIPTION:
If water was dispensed continously
before running diagnostic, the
solenoid is probably faulty.

profile.LOGOUT_MSG: Are you sure you want to log out?
profile.DELETE_ACCOUNT_MSG: Are you sure you want to Delete Account?
profile.PASSWORD_CHANGE_MSG: If you wish to change the password, please fill in the below field; otherwise, leave it empty.

disconnect.POPUP_MSG: Are you sure you want to disconnect?
disconnect.SYNC_MGS: Please wait, system checking and syncing reports to server
disconnect.SYNC_ERROR_MGS: Something went wrong with sync process
